JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Join Our Team as an R&D Engineer! Shape the Future of Mechanical Engineering
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you a visionary mechanical engineer with a passion for cutting-edge research in chip removal processing? Do you combine theoretical expertise with practical know-how, and thrive in an environment of innovation, collaboration, and ethical excellence? If this sounds like you, we have the perfect opportunity!

Why Join Us?

At DAMRC we offer:

  • A chance to be part of a high-tech research center with significant opportunities for professional growth.
  • Direct engagement with forward-thinking customers and industry leaders to tackle real-world challenges.
  • An innovative and supportive environment, surrounded by passionate, highly skilled colleagues.
  • The opportunity to work with advanced technologies driving the green agenda forward.

Your Role: Innovate, Collaborate, Transform

As our R&D Engineer, you'll lead the charge in groundbreaking research and development projects from start to finish. Your work will push the limits of chip removal processing and optimize processes for industrial applications, ensuring your impact is both national and global.

Your Key Responsibilities:

  • Drive the development and refinement of cutting-edge technologies in our R&D center.
  • Optimize processes and production for real-world industrial applications.
  • Collaborate across disciplines and with industry partners to deliver innovative solutions.

What Makes You the Ideal Candidate?

Technical Expertise:

  • Solid foundation in mechanical engineering principles.
  • Specialization in materials engineering is a bonus, but ambitious graduates are welcome.
  • Practical experience in chip removal techniques and material processing is a plus.

Skills & Competencies:

  • Proficient in modern engineering tools and IT systems.
  • Strong analytical skills for solving complex challenges.
  • Fluent in written and spoken English.

Personal Attributes:

  • A collaborative innovator who thrives in teamwork environments.
  • A creative problem solver with a knack for leveraging networks effectively.
  • Eager to join an international community in Herning, Denmark, with a welcoming expat network.

Excited to Learn More?

Contact our Chief of Operations, Christian Skov Lillelund, at +45 2078 9443 or via email at csl@damrc.com.

Ready to Apply?
Send your application and resume to work@damrc.com. Remember to include "R&D Engineer" in the subject line.

We can’t wait to hear from you and explore how you can be part of our mission to revolutionize mechanical engineering!

 

 

Danish Advanced Manufacturing Research Center

DAMRC - Danish Advanced Manufacturing Research Center – is leading within metal processing and interna-tionally recognized for ground-breaking innovations.
Our mission it to help Danish companies to success through innovation and the use of the latest technology. We are in close collaboration with our members, which among others include several leading companies within metal processing and the machinery industry.
You’ll be part of a high-technology research center, experiencing strong growth, and employees are invited to contribute professionally and personally to this journey.
Presently DAMRC employs 20 employees at the address in Herning, Denmark

DAMRC · Industrivej Syd 17A · 7400 Herning · Denmark · www.damrc.com · work@damrc.com
